nodes.title: Grade Appeal Response
nodes.prompt: A student emails to argue for points back on an assignment. Draft your reply as the professor.

rubric.context: Evaluate professor replies to a student requesting a grade change. Tone should be professional, fair, and constructive.

answerBuckets.classifier: Clear, professional, empathetic. Explains grading criteria, references rubric, offers regrade/next steps without promising an unwarranted change.
Polite but thin: acknowledges request but lacks detail on criteria or next steps.
Defensive or dismissive; gives no rationale or next steps; unprofessional tone.
